snippet: BORNSTEIN--Irwin, 87, died Monday, March 7 in Ft. Lauderdale, FL, holding hands with his wife of 53 years, Mary. He is survived by Mary and his four children Alan, Carol, Leslie and Joseph, and his grandchildren Rebecca, Miriam, Jamie, Kerri, Marco, Emma, Jakob and Brooke. Proud son of the Bronx, lifelong Yankees fan, lover of racing, history, Fred Astaire films, crossword puzzles, Judaism and his family. Graveside services at Beth David Cemetery in Elmont, NY on Friday at 11am. 1/3
